subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin offers a way to create, search and display projects, and to vote for in a citizen participation process. Projects are handle by Document Lutece plugin.
This plugin is used by OpenPB site.

section.name: Project Information
section.p: Issue Tracking : this is a link to the issue management system for this project. Issues (bugs, features, change requests) can be created and queried using this link.
